document.full_text: montana governor brian schweitzer on wednesday vetoed a bill that would have repealed the state's seven-year-old, voter-approved law legalizing marijuana for medical purposes.
document.title: montana governor vetoes medical marijuana repeal
lines_and_colors: montana governor brian schweitzer on wednesday vetoed a bill that would have repealed the state's seven-year-old, voter-approved law legalizing marijuana for medical purposes.
